item.title: [DISTRELEC-5411] Field for "Login/Email" is missing in the "newemployee-form"

item.summary: Field for "Login/Email" is missing in the "newemployee-form"

comments.comment:
Hello,
the parameter $

{employeeUid}

is empty in the FE file: account-user-detail-form.jsp
Please assign to BE.
Thanks
fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5405] LT // Cart, add article is not possible
item.description:
Mac OS X 10.9.5
Safari 7.1
TS-28.11

not logged in, B2C store

https://test.distrelec.lt/cart

In cart direct order field, insert article number 6032402 then press enter will clean the number in the field but the article is not added to cart. Otherwise articles with numbers 5579617, 7500505 and 600325 will work, enter these numbers separately in direct order field and press enter then the articles are added in the cart.
item.summary: LT // Cart, add article is not possible

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Tested OK in Safari Mac

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5402] Billing-/Deliveryaddress are not possible to change

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5360] Change font size of H1
item.description:
Please change the <H1> Title size from 40px to 25px on all pages.

  • Product Detail Page
  • My Account: https://test.distrelec.de/my-account/company/information
    • And all subpages
  • Homepage: https://test.distrelec.de/
  • Category Pages: https://test.distrelec.de/de/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/c/cat-L1D_379513
  • List import page: https://test.distrelec.de/import-tool
  • Basket: https://test.distrelec.de/cart
    • Complete checkout way
  • Compare page: https://test.distrelec.de/compare
  • Shopping List: https://test.distrelec.de/shopping
  • Login Page: https://test.distrelec.de/login

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Florian,

All the <h1> elements on the shop use the same font definition. Is it ok, that ALL the <h1> element will have the smaller size, or do I have to change specifically the one mentioned in this ticket?

BR Jan
No for all <H1>

Ok I changed it for all of them on trunk.

Currently the <h2> Elements have a size of 32px. As a consequence of the change of <h1> we should also change the h2 since it would be bigger than <h1> otherwise.

I suggest to change the <h2> elements to 22px, ist that ok?

I Attached a Printscreen of the new <h1>. It is really small..are you really sure, you want it that small?

BR Jan

Hi Jan,
Please define it as followed:

H1 = 28 px
H2 = 25 px
done. can be tested after next deployment.

attachment.name: New H1 Font Size Product Detail Page.png
attachment.author: jawidmer

attachment.name: New H1 Font Size Search Page.png
attachment.author: jawidmer

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5351] Popup info is not showing up in test AT

item.summary: Popup info is not showing up in test AT

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5285] DE // Besteseller import issue
item.description:
The bestseller label is not beeing displayed.
The file is there: erp_bestseller_status-20140929170116734.csv

But no data have been imported.

I'll configured the label directly in the HMC and it worked.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
The problem is the file csv import.
I tried to check the import service in my local env and found the following log, that desn't seems to be fine.

08 Oct 2014 11:52:34 INFO [movexExportITOrderCronJob::de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.internal.jalo.ServicelayerJob] (movexExportITOrderCronJob) [MovexExportOrderJob] Finished export Job in 0 seconds.
08 Oct 2014 11:54:47 INFO [task-scheduler-3] [TimeMeasurementAspect] Processed HeaderInitTask.execute [header=de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.BatchHeader@70aaa68d[file=D:\project\project_distrelec\hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp\processing\erp_bestseller_status-20140929170116734.csv,catalog=distrelecProductCatalog,language=en,net=false]] in 8ms
08 Oct 2014 11:54:47 INFO [task-scheduler-3] [TimeMeasurementAspect] Processed ImpexTransformerTask.execute [header=de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.BatchHeader@70aaa68d[file=D:\project\project_distrelec\hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp\processing\erp_bestseller_status-20140929170116734.csv,catalog=distrelecProductCatalog,language=en,net=false]] in 8ms
08 Oct 2014 11:54:47 INFO [task-scheduler-3] [AbstractDistImpexRunnerTask] File 'D:\project\project_distrelec\hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp\processing\erp_bestseller_status-20140929170116734.csv' has not data, so it will be skipped.
08 Oct 2014 11:54:47 INFO [task-scheduler-3] [TimeMeasurementAspect] Processed AbstractDistImpexRunnerTask$$EnhancerByCGLIB$$72d4f25b.execute [header=de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.BatchHeader@70aaa68d[file=D:\project\project_distrelec\hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp\processing\erp_bestseller_status-20140929170116734.csv,catalog=distrelecProductCatalog,language=en,net=false]] in 6ms
08 Oct 2014 11:54:47 INFO [task-scheduler-3] [TimeMeasurementAspect] Processed CleanupTask.execute [header=de.hybris.platform.acceleratorservices.dataimport.batch.BatchHeader@70aaa68d[file=D:\project\project_distrelec\hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp\processing\erp_bestseller_status-20140929170116734.csv,catalog=distrelecProductCatalog,language=en,net=false]] in 12ms
08 Oct 2014 11:57:34 INFO [movexExportCHOrderCronJob::de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.internal.jalo.ServicelayerJob] (movexExportCHOrderCronJob) [MovexExportOrderJob] Starting export Job.

There were multiple issues on this:

  • on SAP Side
    • missing csv header on the first line
    • SOLVED wrong field separator(comma) instead of semicolon
  • on hybris side
    • SOLVED bug in the impex definition.

Hi Evangelos
All the batch interfaces are considering the first line as hearder line.

could you please add the csv header line in the csv file?
Did you have the chance to add it?
That is done from my side

Now the bestseller label is visible for the product imported as best sellers.
The flag bestseller should be visible in the search result only if the export to factfinder has been completed successfully after the import of erp_bestsellers

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5267] Open Order - Subuser can change privileges in edit function
item.description:
log in as a subuser (open order) -> add product to the cart -> add open order to a existing order -> change date over "Details zu offenen Aufträgen" -> change "Offen für alle Kontakte"

(Sub User can't change priviliges for other users, just admin)

see also print screen
item.summary: Open Order - Subuser can change privileges in edit function

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
in checkout it should not be possible to choose an existing open order for which the current contact doesn't have the edit permission.
For the my-account section there is this ticket to disable the edit buttons DISTRELEC-5369

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5252] Existing SAP-Customer registers for the first time in the Shop
item.description:
KundenNr.SAP: 1000051
Login Name: distrelec.testing+de200@gmail.com
Passwort: distrelec

Error:
The address won't be transmitted.

Issue from Florian Tews
item.summary: Existing SAP-Customer registers for the first time in the Shop

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Also applies to this customer: distrelec.testing+de.b2b@gmail.com

See attached screenshot. When trying to add an address, the following message is displayed: "You are not allowed to add an address." But the address is visible then in myaccount. In Ticket DISTRELEC-5255 it has been mentioned the address is not transferred to sap. Please check why.

The issue is fixed.
The address was in a strange status. I've deleted it and after the next login the address is correctly recreated.

I've also tested the complete existing registration but it seems that everything works fine and no bug has been identified.

Please let me know if a similar problem will happen again

Hi Francesco, what does it mean: the address was in a strange status? It looks to me that the problem of getting an error whilst creating new shipping address only applies to not newly created ones. Could you check this possibility? Thanks.

Hi Nabil
I think you solved a similar issue right?
Please test after next deployment
The problem is due to the region support. Since the region is not used for CH, then we got a NullPointerException when trying to retrieve the region from DB.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4716] Optimize price import / Global import improvements
item.description:
Import of price data currently runs with a speed of 10-20 item/s.
As a result some files take more than 5 hours to be imported.

Target is a speed of about 80-100 items/s.
Price-Translator to be reviewed / refactored (most probably by Raphael Husi).
item.summary: Optimize price import / Global import improvements

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: @Florian: Please define priority/sprint.
Please estimate
@Adi: Can you please also have a look on the performance of the import jobs in a global point of view
